name: shuddhpath-project
description: AI-powered clean air route optimization platform

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.ml:clean: cd ml && python src/clean_data.py data/raw/Varanasi_data.csv data/processed/cleaned_data.csv
scripts.ml:features: cd ml && python src/feature_engineering.py data/processed/cleaned_data.csv data/processed/features.csv
scripts.ml:train: cd ml && python src/train_model.py data/processed/features.csv models/aqi_predictor.joblib
scripts.ml:pipeline: npm run ml:clean && npm run ml:features && npm run ml:train

author: ShuddhPath Team
